revised_title: Discovery of a Species of Trypanosoma in Cerebrospinal Fluid of Sleeping Sickness Cases
tldr: Aldo Castellani discovers a species of trypanosoma in the cerebrospinal fluid of sleeping sickness cases, finding it in 70% of 34 cases. The trypanosoma is distinct from the species found in trypanosoma fever, and its presence in the cerebrospinal fluid may indicate a connection to sleeping sickness.
